definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
see 庫布里克|库布里克[Ku4 bu4 li3 ke4]

sentences.english: The neo-Archean rocks possibly exist in Tieklik metamorphic rocks.
sentences.chinese: 鐵克力克可能有新太古代變質岩系的存在。

sentences.english: When Henrik and his German father become Nazis , the family had changed.
sentences.chinese: 當漢力克與他的德藉父親參加納粹後，家族變質。

sentences.english: The presenter is pleautomotive service engineersd with her new role.
sentences.chinese: 拜力克對自己的新角色很高興。

sentences.english: Alex's spending on food this month went over budget.
sentences.chinese: 艾力克斯這個月的伙食費超出了預算。

sentences.english: Nick Vujicic is reaching out to the corporate world and the educational system with powerful words of encouragement.
sentences.chinese: 力克是接觸到企業世界和強大的文字與鼓勵教育系統。

sentences.english: Aleck went to a local federal college.
sentences.chinese: 亞力克上了當地的聯邦大學。

sentences.english: Mrs. Derrick had asked him to go for the mail at Bonneville, and he had not been able to refuse.
sentences.chinese: 臺力克太太拖他上波恩維爾去拿信，他不好意思推卻。

sentences.english: It might be as well to consult Magnus and Mrs . Derrick.
sentences.chinese: 還是找曼克奈斯和臺力克太太去商量吧。

sentences.english: Your friend Eric boned you, huh?
sentences.chinese: 你朋友艾力克放你鴿子？

sentences.english: The simple method used by the five- year - old boy is called the Heimlich maneuver .
sentences.chinese: 這個五歲男孩使用的這種簡單方法叫哈姆力克急救法。

sentences.english: Nick Vujicic's life demonstrates that all things are possible.
sentences.chinese: 力克的生活表明，所有的事情都是可能的。

sentences.english: Aleck took a ferry to escape.
sentences.chinese: 亞力克乘着渡船逃離了。

sentences.english: No wonder you're so sociable. What's your sign, Eric?
sentences.chinese: 難怪你這麼擅長交際。艾力克，你是什麼星座的？

sentences.english: Ales saw a woman with a flat tire and gave her a hand with it.
sentences.chinese: 阿力克斯見一婦女輪胎泄氣便幫她換胎。

sentences.english: Karen isn't allowed to go on a date with Felix.
sentences.chinese: 凱倫不準和菲力克斯約會。

sentences.english: Selleck is one of the world leading suppliers of high-performance life-science products.
sentences.chinese: 賽力克化學是世界頂尖的高品質生命科學試劑供應商。

definition: to win by a narrow margin/to barely win/narrow victory
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
to beat easily/to gain an easy victory
an upset (esp. in sports)/unexpected turn of events/to pull off a coup/a breakthrough
to win as a result of tenacious effort/to fight off tough competition
to score a victory/to prevail over one's opponents
poised for battle/to square up for a fight
to lose to (sb)/to be outdone by
